DellNICPortMetrics.description: Represents the statistics of the NIC, NIC port, or partition.
DellNICPortMetrics.longDescription: Represents the statistics of the NIC, NIC port, or partition.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DiscardedPkts.description: Indicates the total number of discarded packets.
DiscardedPkts.longDescription: Indicates the total number of discarded packets.

FCCRCErrorCount.description: Indicates the number of FC frames with CRC errors.
FCCRCErrorCount.longDescription: Indicates the number of FC frames with CRC errors.

FCOELinkFailures.description: Indicates the number of FCoE/FIP login failures.
FCOELinkFailures.longDescription: Indicates the number of FCoE/FIP login failures.

FCOEPktRxCount.description: Indicates the number of good (FCS valid) packets received with the active FCoE MAC address of the partition.
FCOEPktRxCount.longDescription: Indicates the number of good (FCS valid) packets received with the active FCoE MAC address of the partition.

FCOEPktTxCount.description: Indicates the number of good (FCS valid) packets transmitted that passed L2 filtering by a specific MAC address.
FCOEPktTxCount.longDescription: Indicates the number of good (FCS valid) packets transmitted that passed L2 filtering by a specific MAC address.

FCOERxPktDroppedCount.description: Indicates the number of receive packets with FCS errors.
FCOERxPktDroppedCount.longDescription: Indicates the number of receive packets with FCS errors.

FQDD.description: A string that contains the Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD), which is a user-friendly name for the object.
FQDD.longDescription: A string that contains the Fully Qualified Device Description (FQDD), which is a user-friendly name for the object.

LanFCSRxErrors.description: Indicates the Lan FCS receive Errors.
LanFCSRxErrors.longDescription: Indicates the Lan FCS receive Errors.

LanUnicastPktRXCount.description: Indicates the total number of Lan Unicast Packets Received.
LanUnicastPktRXCount.longDescription: Indicates the total number of Lan Unicast Packets Received.

LanUnicastPktTXCount.description: Indicates the total number of Lan Unicast Packets Transmitted.
LanUnicastPktTXCount.longDescription: Indicates the total number of Lan Unicast Packets Transmitted.

PartitionLinkStatus.description: Indicates whether the partition link is up or down.
PartitionLinkStatus.longDescription: Indicates whether the partition link is up or down.

PartitionOSDriverState.description: Indicates operating system driver states of the partitions.
PartitionOSDriverState.longDescription: Indicates operating system driver states of the partitions.

RDMARxTotalBytes.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA bytes received.
RDMARxTotalBytes.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA bytes received.

RDMARxTotalPackets.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA packets received.
RDMARxTotalPackets.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA packets received.

RDMATotalProtectionErrors.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA Protection errors.
RDMATotalProtectionErrors.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA Protection errors.

RDMATotalProtocolErrors.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA Protocol errors.
RDMATotalProtocolErrors.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA Protocol errors.

RDMATxTotalBytes.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA bytes transmitted.
RDMATxTotalBytes.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA bytes transmitted.

RDMATxTotalPackets.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA packets transmitted.
RDMATxTotalPackets.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA packets transmitted.

RDMATxTotalReadReqPkts.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA ReadRequest packets transmitted.
RDMATxTotalReadReqPkts.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA ReadRequest packets transmitted.

RDMATxTotalSendPkts.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA Send packets transmitted.
RDMATxTotalSendPkts.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA Send packets transmitted.

RDMATxTotalWritePkts.description: Indicates the total number of RDMA Write packets transmitted.
RDMATxTotalWritePkts.longDescription: Indicates the total number of RDMA Write packets transmitted.

RxBroadcast.description: Indicates the total number of good broadcast packets received.
RxBroadcast.longDescription: Indicates the total number of good broadcast packets received.

RxBytes.description: Indicates the total number of bytes received, including host and remote management pass through traffic. Remote management passthrough traffic is applicable to LOMs only.
RxBytes.longDescription: Indicates the total number of bytes received, including host and remote management pass through traffic. Remote management passthrough traffic is applicable to LOMs only.

RxErrorPktAlignmentErrors.description: Indicates the total number of packets received with alignment errors.
RxErrorPktAlignmentErrors.longDescription: Indicates the total number of packets received with alignment errors.

RxErrorPktFCSErrors.description: Indicates the total number of packets received with FCS errors.
RxErrorPktFCSErrors.longDescription: Indicates the total number of packets received with FCS errors.

RxFalseCarrierDetection.description: Indicates the total number of false carrier errors received from PHY.
RxFalseCarrierDetection.longDescription: Indicates the total number of false carrier errors received from PHY.

RxJabberPkt.description: Indicates the total number of frames that are too long.
RxJabberPkt.longDescription: Indicates the total number of frames that are too long.

RxMulticastPackets.description: Indicates the total number of good multicast packets received.
RxMulticastPackets.longDescription: Indicates the total number of good multicast packets received.

RxMutlicastPackets.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of RxMulticastPackets.
RxMutlicastPackets.description: Indicates the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.
RxMutlicastPackets.longDescription: Indicates the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.

RxPauseXOFFFrames.description: Indicates the flow control frames from the network to pause transmission.
RxPauseXOFFFrames.longDescription: Indicates the flow control frames from the network to pause transmission.

RxPauseXONFrames.description: Indicates the flow control frames from the network to resume transmission.
RxPauseXONFrames.longDescription: Indicates the flow control frames from the network to resume transmission.

RxRuntPkt.description: Indicates the total number of frames that are too short (< 64 bytes).
RxRuntPkt.longDescription: Indicates the total number of frames that are too short (< 64 bytes).

RxUnicastPackets.description: Indicates the total number of good unicast packets transmitted.
RxUnicastPackets.longDescription: Indicates the total number of good unicast packets transmitted.

StartStatisticTime.description: Indicates the measurement time for the first NIC statistics. The property is used with the StatisticTime property to calculate the duration over which the NIC statistics are gathered.
StartStatisticTime.longDescription: Indicates the measurement time for the first NIC statistics. The property is used with the StatisticTime property to calculate the duration over which the NIC statistics are gathered.

StatisticTime.description: Indicates the most recent measurement time for NIC statistics. The property is used with the StatisticStartTime property to calculate the duration over which the NIC statistics are gathered.
StatisticTime.longDescription: Indicates the most recent measurement time for NIC statistics. The property is used with the StatisticStartTime property to calculate the duration over which the NIC statistics are gathered.

TxBroadcast.description: Indicates the total number of good broadcast packets transmitted.
TxBroadcast.longDescription: Indicates the total number of good broadcast packets transmitted.

TxBytes.description: Indicates the total number of bytes transmitted, including host and remote management passthrough traffic. Remote management passthrough traffic is applicable to LOMs only.
TxBytes.longDescription: Indicates the total number of bytes transmitted, including host and remote management passthrough traffic. Remote management passthrough traffic is applicable to LOMs only.

TxErrorPktExcessiveCollision.description: Indicates the number of times a single transmitted packet encountered more than 15 collisions.
TxErrorPktExcessiveCollision.longDescription: Indicates the number of times a single transmitted packet encountered more than 15 collisions.

TxErrorPktLateCollision.description: Indicates the number of collisions that occurred after one slot time (defined by IEEE 802.3).
TxErrorPktLateCollision.longDescription: Indicates the number of collisions that occurred after one slot time (defined by IEEE 802.3).

TxErrorPktMultipleCollision.description: Indicates the number of times that a transmitted packet encountered 2-15 collisions.
TxErrorPktMultipleCollision.longDescription: Indicates the number of times that a transmitted packet encountered 2-15 collisions.

TxErrorPktSingleCollision.description: Indicates the number of times that a successfully transmitted packet encountered a single collision.
TxErrorPktSingleCollision.longDescription: Indicates the number of times that a successfully transmitted packet encountered a single collision.

TxMulticastPackets.description: Indicates the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.
TxMulticastPackets.longDescription: Indicates the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.

TxMutlicastPackets.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of TxMulticastPackets.
TxMutlicastPackets.description: Indicates the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.
TxMutlicastPackets.longDescription: Indicates the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.

TxPauseXOFFFrames.description: Indicates the number of XOFF packets transmitted to the network.
TxPauseXOFFFrames.longDescription: Indicates the number of XOFF packets transmitted to the network.

TxPauseXONFrames.description: Indicates the number of XON packets transmitted to the network.
TxPauseXONFrames.longDescription: Indicates the number of XON packets transmitted to the network.

TxUnicastPackets.description: Indicates the total number of good unicast packets transmitted.
TxUnicastPackets.longDescription: Indicates the total number of good unicast packets transmitted.

title: #DellNICPortMetrics.v1_2_0.DellNICPortMetrics
